description:
This vocabulary is an expression in RDF of the concepts and relations described in the IFLA report on the Functional Requirements for Bibliographic Records (FRBR).

This vocabulary is a work in progress, it includes RDF classes for the group 1, 2 and 3 entities described by the FRBR report and properties corresponding to the core relationships between those entities.  It does not yet describe attributes of the entities.  Where possible, appropriate relationships with other vocabularies are included in order to place this vocabulary in the context of existing RDF work.

Version: 2005-08-10

CorporateBody.label: corporate body
CorporateBody.description: An organization or group of individuals and/or other organizations.

Endeavour.label: endeavour
Endeavour.description: Any of the products of artistic or creative endeavour.

Expression.label: expression
Expression.description: A realization of a single work usually in a physical form.

Item.label: item
Item.description: An exemplar of a single manifestation.

Manifestation.label: manifestation
Manifestation.description: The physical embodiment of one or more expressions.

ResponsibleEntity.label: responsible entity
ResponsibleEntity.description: One responsible for the creation, production, distribution or maintenance of artistic or creative content.

Subject.label: subject
Subject.description: Something that may serve as the subject of a work.

Work.label: work
Work.description: An abstract notion of an artistic or intellectual creation.

adaption.label: adaption
adaption.description: An adaption of a work or expression.

adaptionOf.label: adaption of
adaptionOf.description: A work or expression that is adapted.

complement.label: complement
complement.description: A complement to a work or expression.

complementOf.label: complement of
complementOf.description: A work or expression that is complemented.

creator.label: creator
creator.description: An entity in some way responsible for the creation of a work.

creatorOf.label: creator of
creatorOf.description: A work that was in some way created by of an entity.

embodiment.label: embodiment
embodiment.description: A manifestation that embodies an expression.

embodimentOf.label: embodiment of
embodimentOf.description: An expression that is embodied by a manifestation.

exemplar.label: exemplar
exemplar.description: An item that is an exemplar of a manifestation.

exemplarOf.label: exemplar of
exemplarOf.description: The manifestation that is exemplified by a item.

imitation.label: imitation
imitation.description: An imitation of a work or expression.

imitationOf.label: imitation of
imitationOf.description: A work or expression that is imitated.

owner.label: owner
owner.description: An entity that owns an item.

ownerOf.label: owner of
ownerOf.description: An item that is in some way owned an entity.

producer.label: producer
producer.description: An entity in some way responsible for producing a manifestation.

producerOf.label: producer of
producerOf.description: A manifestation that was in some way produced an entity.

realization.label: realization
realization.description: An expression that is an intellectual or artistic realization of a work.

realizationOf.label: realization of
realizationOf.description: The work that has been realized by an expression.

realizer.label: realizer
realizer.description: An entity in some way responsible for realizing an expression.

realizerOf.label: realizer of
realizerOf.description: An expression that was in some way realized by an entity.

relatedEndeavour.label: related endeavour
relatedEndeavour.description: Another endeavour that is related in some way to an endeavour.

reproduction.label: reproduction
reproduction.description: A reproduction of a manifestation or item.

reproductionOf.label: reproduction of
reproductionOf.description: A manifestation or item that is reproduced.

responsibleEntity.label: responsible entity
responsibleEntity.description: An entity in some way responsible for an endeavour.

responsibleEntityOf.label: responsible entity of
responsibleEntityOf.description: An endeavour that is the responsibility of an entity.

successor.label: successor
successor.description: A successor to a work or expression.

successorOf.label: successor of
successorOf.description: A work or expression that is succeeded.

summarization.label: summarization
summarization.description: A summarization of a work or expression.

summarizationOf.label: summarization of
summarizationOf.description: A work or expression that is summarized.

supplement.label: supplement
supplement.description: A supplement to a work or expression.

supplementOf.label: supplement of
supplementOf.description: A work or expression that is supplemented.

transformation.label: transformation
transformation.description: A transformation of a work or expression.

transformationOf.label: transformation of
transformationOf.description: A work or expression that is transformed.
